findings.title: Arithmetic Accuracy Deviation
findings.description: Potential loss of precision due to incorrect ordering of multiplication and division operations.
findings.contract: Multiple contracts (oracle/libraries/FullMath.sol, strategy/StkBnbStrategy.sol, hMath.sol, abaci.sol, jar.sol)

findings.title: Uninitialized Storage Pointer
findings.description: Anyone can call initialize on the logic contract.
